meta.description: Wishes that cannot be enacted mid-session. The core is frozen. These accumulate until a session explicitly addresses them.

core.description: Changes requiring recompilation of anthill-core. Forbidden during session.

wishes.description: Add PyO3 bindings so Python can call the Rust core directly
wishes.reason: Replace Python tick.py with compiled core for performance and correctness

wishes.description: Move offline progress calculation into the core
wishes.reason: Deterministic catch-up when resuming after time away

plugins.description: Changes to Python plugins. Can be enacted during session.

wishes.description: Plugin that automatically crafts jewelry and adorns ants when conditions are met (surplus ore, low influence, no existing ornamentals)
wishes.reason: Ornamental creation is currently manual intervention. Automating it would create natural cycles of adornment → influence generation → visitor summoning → death → restart.

wishes.description: Plugin that logs significant events to a circular buffer (last 50 events) visible in state
wishes.reason: Mysteries like 'where did influence come from' are unsolvable without event history. Log: spawns, deaths, visitor arrivals/departures, resource spikes, card firings.

wishes.description: Plugin that triggers effects when boredom crosses thresholds - maybe ants become less efficient, or random mutations occur
wishes.reason: Boredom is tracked but has no teeth. Make it matter.

wishes.description: Fix receiver.py check_maintenance: change 'if receiver_silent not in state' to 'if not receiver_silent'
wishes.reason: Bug caused Receiver to never go silent even when maintenance is overdue. Fixed in code but running process has old version.

Original threshold was useless - 0.5 influence is far below the 2.0 summoning threshold. Colony could have ornamental-less periods where influence decayed to 0.5 but never recovered. Fixed in code but running process has old version.

viewer.description: Changes to the web viewer. Can be enacted during session.

wishes.description: Add a scrolling event log panel to the viewer showing recent events (visitor arrivals, deaths, resource spikes, card firings)
wishes.reason: Right now mysteries happen in the state (like influence jumping +0.5) with no visibility. An event log would make the simulation feel alive and observable.

wishes.description: Visual indicator of boredom level - maybe a color shift or particle effect that intensifies as boredom rises
wishes.reason: Boredom is a key signal but it's just a number in meta. Make it visceral.

wishes.description: Particle streams from ornamentals to the Receiver showing influence generation and flow
wishes.reason: Influence is abstract. Show it as light flowing through the colony.

cards.description: New cards or card system changes. Can be enacted during session.

wishes.description: Card that fires when ghost jewelry count exceeds living ornamentals - prompts about memory, loss, and whether to melt down the rings
wishes.reason: 6 ghost rings from dead ants is evocative but unexplored. Make it narratively resonant.

wishes.description: Card that fires when you have the resources for The Bridge but haven't built it - questions what you're afraid of or waiting for
wishes.reason: The Bridge has been buildable for a while. Prompt the question directly.

architecture.description: Structural changes that span multiple systems.
